phrs.translation: 监督权力；监督当局；监察权

sentences.sentence: She has a supervisory role on the project.
sentences.translation: 她负责这个项目的监督工作。

sentences.sentence: Only 6.1 percent of users have ever appealed to supervisory departments and about half of them do not know how to cancel unwanted SMS subscriptions.
sentences.translation: 仅有6.1%的手机用户曾向监管部门提出申诉，其中约一半人不知道如何取消不想要的短信订阅服务。

sentences.sentence: Most supervisory boards meet only twice a year.
sentences.translation: 大多数监理会一年只开两次会。
